actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure with respect to the examination of propective jurors.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure to revise certain guidelines with respect to the examination of prospective jurors. Requires the court to permit the defendant or his attorney and the attorney for the Government each at least 30 minutes to conduct an oral examination of the prospective jury.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure with respect to the examination of propective jurors.
